# PortalCrossingComponent

**Structure**

A component that allows entities to cross portal boundaries.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PortalCrossingComponent
```

## Overview

You use this with [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent/CrossingMode-swift.enum] to enable portal crossing features.

When you set this on an entity, this component defines whether the entity is capable of crossing the portal boundary.

Entities without this component, entities where [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity/isEnabled] is `false`, and entities without a containing entity that specifies inherited portal crossing, aren’t able to cross portals.

See [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PortalComponent] for detailed usage.

## Initializers

- **init()**

## Portals

- **PortalMaterial**: A material that makes the mesh part a portal to a different world.
- **PortalMaterial.FaceCulling**: An alias for the cull mode object that’s appropriate for this material class.
- **PortalMaterial.TriangleFillMode**: An alias for the triangle fill mode object that’s appropriate for this material class.
- **PortalComponent**: A component that turns mesh surfaces into portals to a different world.
- **WorldComponent**: A component that defines a portal world.
